alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Garfield; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 10:41PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield, southern McCone, northwestern Prairie and northwestern Dawson Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1039 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Brockway, or 26 miles southwest of Circle, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Circle, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Brockway, Hillside, Weldon, Crow Rock and Watkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for northeastern Montana.
